Methods

addEvents

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:469

Adds event listeners with jQuery.

createEvents

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:379

Creates event related methods

destroy

() chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:722

Destroys nanoScroller and restores browser's native scrollbar.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ destroy: true });

flash

() chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:751

To flash the scrollbar gadget for an amount of time defined in plugin settings (defaults to 1,5s). Useful if you want to show the user (e.g. on pageload) that there is more content waiting for him.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ flash: true });

generate

() private chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:510

Generates nanoScroller's scrollbar and elements for it.

getBrowserScrollbarWidth

() Number private static

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:266

Returns browser's native scrollbar width

Returns:

Number: the scrollbar width in pixels

preventScrolling

(
  • event
  • direction
)
private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:317

Prevents the rest of the page being scrolled when user scrolls the .content element.

Parameters:

  • event Event
  • direction String

    Scroll direction (up or down)

removeEvents

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:491

Removes event listeners with jQuery.

reset

() chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:552

Resets nanoScroller's scrollbar.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller();

restore

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:540

scroll

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:625

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ scroll: 'top' });

scrollBottom

(
  • offsetY
)
chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:648

Scroll at the bottom with an offset value

Parameters:

  • offsetY Number

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ scrollBottom: value });

scrollTo

(
  • node
)
chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:686

Scroll to an element

Parameters:

  • node Node

    A node to scroll to.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ scrollTo: $('#a_node') });

scrollTop

(
  • offsetY
)
chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:667

Scroll at the top with an offset value

Parameters:

  • offsetY Number

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ scrollTop: value });

stop

() chainable

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:705

To stop the operation. This option will tell the plugin to disable all event bindings and hide the gadget scrollbar from the UI.

Example:

$(".nano").nanoScroller({ stop: true });

updateScrollValues

() private

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:358

Updates those nanoScroller properties that are related to current scrollbar position.

Properties

Boolean

Defined in bin/javascripts/jquery.nanoscroller.js:58
